TextView.android:text: Let the League of the Legends begin.
Cause Actions Speak Louder Than Words.
Snipe down memes to rush to glory.
Bid your best foot forward as the stakes are high
You don't need to know how, cubes will fall into place
Do you know some Sine Language? Cos we think you do.
Be the Ambani of your dreams before others hire you.
Talk is cheap. Show us the code.
Let your mother tongue exude the magic of your emotions.
I think and I know things.
